7 December 2009

Palin Ignites New Debate On GOP Support For Israel

by Aaron Lord

http://www.thejewishweek.com/viewArticle/c37_a17333/News/National.html<p>Although it's good to see that Jews are seeing through
dispensationalist agendas, I think it's sad that in the last 100

Christian, the default assumption is that the person holds a
